sourcing.instructions: - Erbium (Er) can be sourced from chemical suppliers like Sigma-Aldrich or online retailers.
steps: - Erbium (Er) can be sourced from chemical suppliers like Sigma-Aldrich or online retailers.
1. Weigh each of the materials (Er, Eu, Ge) using a precision scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh each of the materials (Er, Eu, Ge) using a precision scale.

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace or oven to a temperature of 1000 °C.
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a furnace or oven to a temperature of 1000 °C.

steps: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool down naturally to room temperature.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool down naturally to room temperature.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the crucible.
